title: High-throughput error corrected Nanopore single cell transcriptome sequencing
abstract: E18 mouse brain single cell profiling using the 10x Genomics Chromium instrument workflow with either Illumina short read sequencing for the standard gene profiling and Nanopore PromethION long read sequencing for isoform profiling.
overall_design: E18 mouse brain single cell Chromium emulsion was split into two aliquots targeting 190 and 951 cells and processed in parallel for gene and isoform profiling with Illumina and Nanopore sequencing.
summary: E18 mouse brain single cell profiling using the 10x Genomics Chromium instrument workflow with either Illumina short read sequencing for the standard gene profiling and Nanopore PromethION long read sequencing for isoform profiling.
